attributes.action: ensure that true competition is introduced in the domestic water provision/sewerage market by April 1st 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is outrageous that we, the consumers, are held at the whim of our local monopoly providers of clean- and waste-water services.

True competition between domestic providers will force them to provide a better (and cheaper) service.
